pages.text: Run these commands after selecting an area to execute it.

$(li)$(l)//set stone$()$(br) sets stone in the entire selection $(br)$(li)$(l)//set air$()$(br) clears the entire selection $(br)$(li)$(l)//smooth$()$(br) smooths everything. Useful for terrain! $(br)$(li)$(l)//replace dirt stone$()$(br) replaces dirt with stone

$(li)$(l)//replace dirt,air stone$()$(br) replaces both dirt & air with stone $(br)$(li)$(l)//replace stone air$()$(br) replaces all stone with air $(br)$(li)$(l)//overlay dirt$()$(br) puts a layer of dirt on everything $(br)$(li)$(l)//move 1$()$(br) moves the selection in the direction you face
